oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pathways for Change: 10 Theories to Inform Advocacy and Policy Change Efforts
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: S. Stachowiak
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This brief report lays out 10 theories of advocacy and policy change. These theories are intended to articulate the policy making process and identify causal connections supported by research to explain how and why a change may or may not occur. It further provides examples of the way in which advocates, funders, and evaluators can use these theories in their work.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Advocacy
